name: Genitori Antismog
membership:
EEB Clean Air Working Group
T&E, European Federation for Transport and Environment
goal:
Address competently and on the basis of scientific data the very harsh air pollution problem in the city of Milan and Lombardy Region by raising awareness and forcing public authorities to implement actions to comply with Air Quality EU laws. We recently presented our observation document to Milan's Urban Plan for Sustainable Mobility and to Lombardy Region's Plan for action to improove air quality (PRIA).
We do educational projects in schools, projects with traders and companies friends of the air, lobby on the authorities and participate or create projects to achieve improvements under the air quality point of view and under the sustainable mobility point of view.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Education, Environment, Public Health, Transport
